title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: March 19, 2023, 05:48:44 PMLast edit: March 21, 2023, 01:03:53 PM by cafter
content: I stuck in a critical confusion , need your opinions ,I am going to get admission in a undergraduate course in some days not yet decided, I want your opinion on it, is it important to get college education and certificates about that specific field/subject/degree, because i don't have enough money to invest in education and thinking to buy bitcoin by half of education money , not getting the undergraduate course, you think it is a right decision, or i should learn at college, it may make me socially shy if i don't go to college, If, I will learn everything from books/online, will any company will give me job by just completing school/12th class.? and without any type of certificate .?please answer by quoting every question and word may i forgot to add question mark(it seem annoying like )it's important for me please give your opinion i will get broader overview.

comments.author: virtualdn
comments.body: College education and certifications don't help too much these days. This was valid 20-30 years ago but not anymore. You can learn a lot online for free. Investing in BTC might be good in the long run. Nobody can give you an exact answer. Only you can decide what's best for you. Good luck!

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Maybe with the money you've got for education it is possible to buy a small portion of the Bitcoin. Through education you'll be able to make yourself better with acquiring knowledge about bitcoin and the same could help you have even more number of bitcoin. Just because you've done your school education you were able to know about bitcoin, if not things would've been in the opposite way.

comments.author: deathcode
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 05:48:44 PMI stuck in a critical confusion , need your opinions ,I am going to get admission in a undergraduate course in some days not yet decided, I want your opinion on it, is it important to get college education and certificates about that specific field/subject/degree,  First, I think education is very important! My advice is just follow the undergraduate program in that college. Continue to study and process to improve yourself in college.The educational title that you will wear later after graduation and all the certificates or all the knowledge you get are actually just bonuses. The most important thing is that if you enter college or go through that education, you will continue to hone our thinking skills, ways of solving our problems, ways of social life with a wider and more diverse scope.Sometimes a person will work not in accordance with the degree he has. But the important point is that you have to improve your thinking skills, speaking skills, writing skills, problem solving skills and social skills.This is a matter of increasing your abilities and elevating yourself to work, family and society in the future.Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 05:48:44 PMIf, I will learn everything from books/online, will any company will give me job by just completing school/12th class.? and without any type of certificate .?The company may still accept you according to the latest education, but don't expect to be able to occupy a good position or get a lot of salary in a company.Sometimes there are several large companies that accept employees regardless of their last education, but the employee must really have something expertise that not everyone has.Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 05:48:44 PMbecause i don't have enough money to invest in education and thinking to buy bitcoin by half of education money ,Investment is important, but you will not be able to invest if you do not have income later.Education is one way to improve the quality of yourself and to get a good and decent income if you want to work in a certain company.

comments.body: you obviously have an idea of the type of industry you wish to work in, in the futureso research your dream job as if your ready to apply for the job. look at the requirementsdoes it ask for experience. or qualificationsphone up a few potential employers and ask them what is the best way to succeed in getting atleast an interview and to impress them to get the job. is it working knowledge or educated knowledgesome employers will allow interviews/applications from people that learned independantly even via googling courses and learning from the internet who can prove they know it by showing a portfolio of work or examples of knowledge... other employers only recruit people with formal education qualificationsso ensure your plans match what your prefered future jobs requires

comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 05:48:44 PMI stuck in a critical confusion , need your opinions ,I am going to get admission in a undergraduate course in some days not yet decided, I want your opinion on it, is it important to get college education and certificates about that specific field/subject/degree, because i don't have enough money to invest in education and thinking to buy bitcoin by half of education money , not getting the undergraduate course, you think it is a right decision, or i should learn at college, it may make me socially shy if i don't go to college, and it will become hard to find a girlfriend(legit one).If, I will learn everything from books/online, will any company will give me job by just completing school/12th class.? and without any type of certificate .?please answer by quoting every question and word may i forgot to add question mark(it seem annoying like )it's important for me please give your opinion i will get broader overview.Which profession do you want to choose? If you want to become an engineer or a doctor, you have to go to University. But if you want to become a web developer, like front-end developer, react developer, UI/UX designer, then you don't need to go to University because all that matters for employer is your portfolio. You have to know your local market and how is the situation in certain fields. There are professions in some countries where companies don't require certificates but there are countries where certificates carry actual value, for example in Germany.You have to fully analyze and decide yourself what to do, it's your future, not ours, so it's easy to talk about.

comments.body: I think it's important to show your career in the future with a very high education especially if you finish with a doctorate or other higher degree, with the funds you have now it's better to pay for that education because every opportunity will be great when you have become a doctor because I believe that with our education we will be better in terms of degrees or in terms of work.I will never say that investing in bitcoin is bad, in fact it is good, but in this investment you need patience and also courage when you dare to afford to lose, we cannot predict the price in the near future or get rich quickly like many people say.However, when you are accompanied by higher education and investment, that is the best way and investing in bitcoin can start small.
